location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 23: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra], to [John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire]

mods.abstract: This letter has no stated recipient, but it would appear to be addressed to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire. In the letter William Digges Latouche and George Abraham state that they have been informed that Soliman Aga [SÃ¼leyman Agha] the Mussaleem has left Schiraz [Shiraz], on his way to Bussora [Basra], by way of Bushire. Beaumont is informed that the Successhas been dispatched for Soliman Aga's passage from Bushire.
